questions.question: How did a portfolio with 60% AAPL, 20% MSFT, and 20% TSLA perform over the last 5 years?
questions.short_question: Portfolio performance of AAPL, MSFT, TSLA in 5 years?

questions.question: What was the annualized return of a portfolio where 50% was invested in FAANG stocks and 50% in top semiconductor stocks?
questions.short_question: Annualized return of FAANG and semiconductor portfolio?

questions.question: How did a growth-focused portfolio with higher allocations to AMZN and TSLA compare to a more balanced tech portfolio including AAPL, MSFT, and GOOG in the past decade?
questions.short_question: Growth-focused vs balanced tech portfolio in 10 years?

questions.question: What was the performance of a dividend-focused tech portfolio including AAPL, MSFT, and INTC compared to the NASDAQ 100 over the last 5 years?
questions.short_question: Dividend tech portfolio vs NASDAQ 100 in 5 years?

questions.question: How did a momentum-driven portfolio with quarterly rebalancing of top 5 tech stocks perform compared to a static buy-and-hold strategy in the last 3 years?
questions.short_question: Momentum-driven vs static tech portfolio in 3 years?

questions.question: What has been the volatility and returns of a portfolio with 40% in big tech (AAPL, MSFT) and 60% in emerging tech (SNAP, UBER) over the past 5 years?
questions.short_question: Volatility and returns of big tech vs emerging tech in 5 years?

questions.question: How did a risk-adjusted tech portfolio with 30% in AAPL, 30% in MSFT, 20% in GOOG, and 20% in NVDA perform during the COVID-19 pandemic?
questions.short_question: Risk-adjusted tech portfolio performance during COVID-19?

questions.question: What were the cumulative returns of a portfolio split 70% in high-growth tech stocks (TSLA, NVDA) and 30% in more stable tech stocks (AAPL, MSFT) over the past 5 years?
questions.short_question: Cumulative returns of high-growth vs stable tech in 5 years?

questions.question: How did a sector-rotating strategy focusing on tech stocks in different market conditions perform compared to a traditional tech ETF?
What has been the performance of a portfolio with dynamic weighting based on market cap changes among AAPL, MSFT, GOOG, AMZN, and FB over the last 5 years?
questions.short_question: Performance of market cap-weighted tech portfolio in 5 years?
